explains: adj. 望远镜的，（镜头、仪器）能望远的；用望远镜观看的；可伸缩的，套叠式的

sentences.en: His telescopic observations are justly immortal.
sentences.cn: 伽利略用望远镜所作的观察确实是不朽的。

sentences.en: Telescopic views reveal the spectacular cluster's hundreds of thousands of stars.
sentences.cn: 望远镜照片展示这个壮观星团的数十万恒星。

sentences.en: Normally faint and elusive, the Jellyfish Nebula is caught in this alluring, false-color, telescopic view.
sentences.cn: 常常是暗淡和难以找到的水母星云，被拍进这张迷人的假彩色望远镜照片。
